description: Cross-references VAERS adverse event reports with FDA package insert documentation
key_capabilities: Validate if VAERS symptoms are documented in FDA package inserts
Find similar VAERS reports based on symptoms and vaccine
Normalize symptom names across different vaccines
Cross-reference between VAERS and FDA documentation

key_files: create_comparison_database.py - Step 1: Process VAERS + PDF data

files: json_data_schema.json - Schema for all JSON files
vaers_merged_schema.json - Schema for VAERS data structure

steps: Process VAERS symptom counts for crosswalked vaccines
Run LLM validation requiring exact PDF quotes (~4 minutes)
Build unified database with individual reports

data_quality.llm_validation: Symptoms classified using Claude AI with strict PDF quote requirements
data_quality.false_positive_prevention: Automatic validation that quoted PDF events exist
data_quality.crosswalk_verification: Manual review of 14 vaccine name mappings

frontend_integration.api_design: Files designed for direct JSON loading in web applications
frontend_integration.linking_strategy: Vaccine names provide keys to link between datasets

symptom_classification.requirement: Exact PDF adverse event quotes required

data_integrity.vaers_processing: Direct CSV parsing with error handling
data_integrity.pdf_extraction: OCR + LLM extraction with success validation
data_integrity.crosswalk_quality: Manual verification of all 14 vaccine mappings
